sentence.Network_cn: 该牧场位于一个辽阔高原的中部.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Spanish rancho 'group of persons eating together'

entry.tran: （尤指饲养牛、马、羊等的）大农场，大牧场
entry.def: A ranch is a large farm used for raising animals, especially cattle, horses, or sheep.

example.ex: He lives on a cattle ranch in Australia.
example.tran: 他在澳大利亚靠一个牧牛场为生。

means.word_mean: 1. farm consisting of a large tract of land along with facilities needed to raise livestock (especially cattle)

Sentence.sentence: Around the same time, I noticed that those who part with $2285 a night to stay in a cliff-top room at the Post Ranch Inn in Big Sur, California, pay partly for the privilege of not having a TV in their rooms; the future of travel, I'm reliably told, lies in "black-hole resorts," which charge high prices precisely because you can't get online in their rooms

For more than 20 years, therefore, I have been going several times a year-often for no longer than three days-to a Benedictine hermitage（修道院）,40 minutes down the road, as it happens, from the Post Ranch Inn
What is special about the Post Ranch Inn?
